Html:
Hi,
I updated my project to V1.6 and I have to swap from MapType to MapProviders, but I got it.
So I wonder if there is now an easy way to add new providers like

http://www.geodaten.bayern.de/BayernViewer2.0/index.cgi

or

http://www.tomtom.com/livetraffic/

many thanks
Rainer
i'll check it some day, tomtom looks simple

Hi,

I'm located in Germany, so going to
http://www.google.com/maps/
or
http://www.bing.com/maps/
with a normal Browser shows my city correctly written  "München".

With GMAP.NET at position
Me.GMapControl1.Position = New GMap.NET.PointLatLng(48.13723, 11.5755)

the city ist named english = "Munich".

This works fine for Google, but not for Bing and Yahoo !
Yahoo is adressed here http://de.maps.yahoo.com/

Can I set the URL of the tile server ?
Here are as well OSM servers sponsored by Strato etc.
well you have to create new provider, copy/paste Yahoo provider, change url, name, id and thats it
